value.title: StarCraft 2 - Coaching ZvT vs Mech featuring QXC and Socke!
value.excerpt: I coach a 5k MMR Zerg on how to beat mech. His friend ex-pro QXC comes on the call to help out and plays a match vs him as well! Ex protoss pro Socke also helps us out as his first opponent! -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig

value.title: StarCraft 2 - Control Group Stealing - Coaching
value.excerpt: I coach a player on how to make use of the incredible "control group stealing" mechanic that allows you to simultaenously remove units from any control groups, whilst adding them to a new one. -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig

value.title: StarCraft 2 - Do Zerg B2GM builds work in Grandmaster? (Bronze to GM #11)

Watch the B2GM Playlists: Zerg B2GM : https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFUDU8AOevUd6ej64SOB429mHyuRL-XC9 Protoss B2GM: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOrKQEirgvjBJrKM31yhwA8v54pcBuXsx
